snippet: Two Alameda County sheriff’s deputies were placed on leave after a video showed them striking a suspect numerous times after a car chase.
abstract: Two Alameda County, Calif, sheriff's deputies are placed on leave after video footage shows them chasing down suspect Stanislav Petrov and striking him repeatedly while he was on ground and not resisting; county's public defender calls video shocking and says incident is reminiscent of beating of Rodney King by Los Angeles police in 1991.
lead_paragraph: Two Alameda County sheriff’s deputies were placed on leave after a video showed them striking a suspect numerous times after a car chase.

headline.main: Video of an Arrest in San Francisco Triggers Investigations Into Deputies’ Use of Force
headline.print_headline: Video of an Arrest in San Francisco Triggers Investigations Into Deputies’ Use of Force
